title: Macau Grand Hyatt Glamour in Cotai with Onsite Dining, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Unparalleled luxury awaits at this glitzy retreat within Cotai's iconic City of Dreams. This five-star sanctuary blends sleek, contemporary design with indulgent comfort, featuring a shimmering 40-metre outdoor pool and impressive fitness centre. Rejuvenate at Isala Spa with bespoke treatments rooted in traditional Chinese wellness, then unwind in an outdoor hot tub or tranquil steam room.

Cravings are easily satisfied - from hand-pulled noodles and signature Peking duck at Beijing Kitchen, to lobster specialties at mezza9 Macau or fresh pastries and international dishes in the laid-back Lobby Lounge. Slow down at nearby Coloane Village, where pastel houses, sea breezes and Portuguese egg tarts offer a slice of old-world charm. With retail therapy and rich cultural immersion at your doorstep, you’re perfectly placed to explore Macau’s best.
offer_address: City of Dreams, Estrada do Istmo, Cotai, Macau SAR, China
